resources.string: Say \"Hello Vuzix\" or click "Listen" then read any button
Voice SDK only runs on Vuzix M300 version 1.2.2 or higher
Please upgrade the M300 to get all features

1- Say "Hello Vuzix"(View-zix) until the text of the button changes
 2- Select a company by saying the number on its left. The text on top of the list will change
 3- Say "Next" to go to the login screen

 Please note that if the number has more than one digit, say each digit./n For example, to select the number 15, we would have to say "onefive".

1- Select a Warehouse by saying the number on its left. The text on top of the list will change
 2- Say "Next" to go to the zone screen

 Please note that if the number has more than one digit, say each digit./n For example, to select the number 15, we would have to say "onefive".

1- Select a Zone by saying the number on its left. The text on top of the list will change
 2- Say "Next" to see the orders of the selected zone

 Please note that if the number has more than one digit, say each digit./n For example, to select the number 15, we would have to say "onefive".
